===Kayvan Sabeghi arrest===
===Kayvan Sabeghi arrest===
  +
{{ external media
  +
| align = right
  +

  +
| video1= "[http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/video/2011/nov/18/occupy-oakland-veteran-beaten-police-video Occupy Oakland: Iraq war veteran Kayvan Sabehgi beaten by police]"

Kayvan Sabeghi, a former [[United States Army Rangers|U.S. Army Ranger]] who served in the [[Iraq War]] and the [[War in Afghanistan (2001âpresent)|War in Afghanistan]], was seriously injured while being arrested by police that evening. He was walking away from the late evening protest when he was stopped by police. <ref>{{cite news|last=Gabbatt|first=Adam|title=Occupy Oakland: second Iraq war veteran injured after police clashes|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/nov/04/occupy-oakland-second-veteran-injured|accessdate=November 6, 2011|newspaper=The Guardian|date=November 4, 2011}}</ref> Arrest records show Sabeghi was booked on "suspicion of resisting arrest". <ref>[http://www.armytimes.com/news/2011/11/ap-iraq-war-veteran-hurt-occupy-protests-110511/ Another Iraq veteran hurt in Occupy protests]</ref>
Kayvan Sabeghi, a former [[United States Army Rangers|U.S. Army Ranger]] who served in the [[Iraq War]] and the [[War in Afghanistan (2001âpresent)|War in Afghanistan]], was seriously injured while being arrested by police that evening. He was walking away from the late evening protest when he was stopped by police. <ref>{{cite news|last=Gabbatt|first=Adam|title=Occupy Oakland: second Iraq war veteran injured after police clashes|url=http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2011/nov/04/occupy-oakland-second-veteran-injured|accessdate=November 6, 2011|newspaper=The Guardian|date=November 4, 2011}}</ref> Arrest records show Sabeghi was booked on "suspicion of resisting arrest". <ref>[http://www.armytimes.com/news/2011/11/ap-iraq-war-veteran-hurt-occupy-protests-110511/ Another Iraq veteran hurt in Occupy protests]</ref>
